posts.title: Go leetcode
posts.excerpt: 这里是用GO语言刷leetcode算法题的记录，会不定时更新
posts.text: 这里是用GO语言刷leetcode算法题的记录，会不定时更新 1、两数之和（1）暴力求解法123456789101112131415161718192021func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { res:=make([]int,2,2) flag:=0 for i1,v1 :=range(nums){ for i2,v2:=range(nums){ if i1==i2{ continue } if v1+v2==target{ res[0]=i1 res[1]=i2 flag=1 break } } if flag==1{ break } } return res} 时间复杂度为o(n^2),效率很差 （2）哈希表12345678910111213141516func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { res:=make([]int,2,2) hash:=make(map[int]int) for i,v:=range(nums){ tempt:=target-v _,ok:=hash[tempt] if(ok){ res[0]=hash[tempt] res[1]=i break }else{ hash[v]=i } } return res}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
